column4: hi i just inserted an sd card but it didn't automount. how do i find out what device i need to mount? (I did fdisk -l and it didn't show the sd card)

I beleive thre is a trick regarding sd cards they don' t mount automaticaly like usb drives but more like floppies,  you need to do someting after you put them in ,  try looking up "sd card" in the forum www.ubuntuforums.org  I'M sure it is covered
